long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension modifies YouTube's viewing experience by replacing all video thumbnails with a custom "Chill Guy" image. 

Key Features:
• Automatically replaces YouTube video thumbnails with a consistent, calm image
• Works on YouTube's homepage, search results, and recommendation sections
• Creates a more relaxed browsing experience on YouTube
• Simple, lightweight extension that only affects thumbnail images

Perfect for users who:
• Want a more minimalist YouTube experience
• Prefer a distraction-free browsing environment
• Enjoy a consistent, peaceful visual theme while browsing YouTube

This extension simply changes the appearance of thumbnails and does not collect any user data or modify any other YouTube functionality.
